entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cranbrook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:24 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cranbrook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:03 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cranbrook Airport 7:31 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: SW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:16 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:16 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 5:16 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
